vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ῥοῦφος, -ου, ὁ
(Lat.), Rufus: Mrk.15:21, Rom.16:13.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Mrk.15.21;
son of: Simon (G4613J);
brother of: Alexander (G0223)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
魯孚 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "紅"
一個基督徒的名字 #可 15:21;羅 16:13|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
鲁孚 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "红"
一个基督徒的名字 #可 15:21;罗 16:13|

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.13
